home.paragraph_subtitle: What is our Goalkeeper Training Campus?
home.paragraph_1: It's much more than just training. It's a formative experience designed exclusively for goalkeepers who want to take their performance to the next level. Over several days of intensive work, our specialized coaches focus on perfecting every aspect of goalkeeping: individual technique, positioning, reflexes, decision-making, aerial play, one-on-ones, and ball distribution, among others.
home.paragraph_2: Each session is designed to bring out the maximum potential of every goalkeeper, combining specific exercises, error analysis, tailored physical and psychological preparation, and personalized follow-up. All in a professional, motivating environment surrounded by other goalkeepers with the same passion for improvement. And best of all, always working in SMALL GROUPS.
home.paragraph_3: Compete against other goalkeepers in battles and competitive games to win Total Keepers prizes!
home.founder_quote: The goalkeeper is the most important player on the team. Not only do they defend the goal, but they also organize the defense and are the first attacker. That's why their training must be comprehensive and tailored to their specific needs.
home.testimonial_1: In my experience during the weeks I was at the campus, I don't think I've seen things that could be improved, as it was very good.
home.testimonial_2: The treatment was excellent, she came home happy every day. She appreciated the advice she was given.
home.testimonial_6: Very good and intense training sessions, we'll be back

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.age_question: What age groups do you accept?
faq.age_answer: We accept goalkeepers aged 12-25, from amateur to semi-professional level.
faq.equipment_question: What equipment do I need to bring?
faq.equipment_answer: Just your regular training clothes and boots. All goalkeeper equipment is provided.
faq.meals_answer: Yes, nutritious meals and sports drinks are provided throughout each training day.
faq.refund_question: Can I get a refund if I can't attend?
faq.refund_answer: Full refunds available up to 14 days before the session starts.
faq.accommodation_answer: We can recommend partner hotels and hostels with special rates for our participants.
faq.scouts_answer: Yes, we regularly have scouts from La Liga and Segunda División teams attending.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.voting_question: How does the voting process work?
faq.voting_answer: Simply click on your preferred design above. You can vote once per person. The design with the most votes at the end of March will be selected for production.
faq.multiple_votes_answer: No, votes are final once cast. This ensures the integrity of the voting process. Please review all options carefully before voting.
faq.production_question: When will the winning design be available?
faq.production_answer: The winning design will be available for pre-order in May 2025, with shipping beginning in June 2025. Check our timeline above for detailed dates.
faq.discount_question: How do I get the early bird discount?
faq.discount_answer: All voting participants automatically qualify for 30% off pre-orders. You'll receive a discount code via email after voting closes.
faq.shipping_answer: Yes, we ship worldwide. Shipping costs and delivery times vary by location. Free shipping is available for orders over €100.
